title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for integrand

1 point is earned for the answer

Solving y=2 x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39CC@ for x yields x= y 2 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AB6@ .

Each rectangular cross section has area ( 3 y 2 4 )( y 2 4 )= 3 16 y 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4478@ .

Volume= ∫ 0 6 3 16 y 4 dy MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4653@
